## Model 1

#### Multiple Linear Regression 

Outcome variable - sustainable_modes_total

Predictors - state, median age, and population density

```{r}
lm.fit <- lm(sustainable_modes_total ~ State + age_medianE + pop_density, data = model_data)
summary(lm.fit)
```

```{r}
summary(lm(sustainable_modes_total ~ State * pop_density , data = model_data))
```
